K12Dx_H0554:290a-1: aa mri ta bha ba n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12Dx_H0554:290a-3: bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12Dx_H0554:290a-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12Dx_H0554:290a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K12Dx_H0554:290a-6: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab byang chub kyi shing drung na /
K12Dx_H0554:290a-9: mi rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs so //
K12Dx_H0554:290b-0: de nas 'khor rnams kyi nang nas khyim bdag bzang @290b skyong gis /
K12Dx_H0554:290b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang /
K12Dx_H0554:290b-2: rigs drug gi sems can thams cad la /
K12Dx_H0554:290b-5: zhal zas kyi mchod pa chen po bshams nas /
K12Dx_H0554:290b-6: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12Dx_H0554:290b-9: btung ba 'di rnams sems can rnams kyi don du byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K12Dx_H0554:290b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi 'byung ba
K12Dx_H0554:290b-11: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
K12Dx_H0554:290b-12: te / zhal zas kyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil
K12Dx_H0554:290b-13: 'khor gyi steng du ram dkar po la chos thams
K12Dx_H0554:290b-14: cad rdul dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung
K12Dx_H0554:290b-15: bas zhal zas kyi dri ma dag par gyur to
K12Dx_H0554:290b-16: te / // yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aa dkar po bsams te /
K12Dx_H0554:290b-17: zhal zas lha'i bdud rtsi dang /
K12Dx_H0554:290b-19: yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
K12Dx_H0554:290b-20: aom zhes pas 'phags pa dang sems can thams cad mnyes shing tshim par gyur to //
K12Dx_H0554:290b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rdo rje ltar byas te gzungs 'di gzungs so //
K12Dx_H0554:290b-22: aom sarba dharma t'a badzra siddhi h'um/
K12Dx_H0554:290b-24: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga t'e bhyo bi shva
K12Dx_H0554:290b-25: mu khe bhya: sarba th'a kham audga te spha ra
K12Dx_H0554:290b-26: na ai mam ga ga na kham sv'ah'a /
K12Dx_H0554:290b-27: aom ne ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te sam bha ra sam bha ra h'um/
K12Dx_H0554:290b-28: aom ru ru sphu ru dzv'a la tishtha siddha lo tsa ni sarba aartha sa dha ni sv'ah'a /
K12Dx_H0554:290b-29: zhes gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu mchod pa'i zhal zas kyis mchod nas /
K12Dx_H0554:290b-30: 'phags ba thams cad mnyes pa dang /
K12Dx_H0554:290b-31: sems can thams cad bde bar gyur to //
K12Dx_H0554:291a-1: bdag bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12Dx_H0554:291a-2: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams kyi mthu dang /
K12Dx_H0554:291a-3: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu dang /
K12Dx_H0554:291a-4: bdag gi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis /
K12Dx_H0554:291a-5: 'phags pa thams cad kyi pho brang dang /
K12Dx_H0554:291a-6: sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang /
K12Dx_H0554:291a-7: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la chos dang zang
K12Dx_H0554:291a-8: zing gi longs spyod dpag tu med cing brjod kyis
K12Dx_H0554:291a-9: mi khyab pa / brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa 'byung zhing rgyas par gyur cig /
K12Dx_H0554:291a-10: sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /
K12Dx_H0554:291a-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis
K12Dx_H0554:291a-17: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te chos kyi
K12Dx_H0554:291a-18: sbyin pa dang / bdag gi zang zing gi sbyin pa 'dis bde ba dang /
K12Dx_H0554:291a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12Dx_H0554:291a-21: khyim bdag bzang skyong legs so //
K12Dx_H0554:291a-22: dka' ba'i spyod pa 'di lta bu byed pa legs so //
K12Dx_H0554:291a-23: nga'i 'khor lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang 'di ltar mchod par bya'o //
K12Dx_H0554:291a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12Dx_H0554:291a-25: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang /
K12Dx_H0554:291a-26: khyim bdag bzang skyong rjes su yi rangs te /
K12Dx_H0554:291a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de dga' bar gyur to //
